price: 13. Waxay u sameeyeen wuxuu rabo oo mixraabyo ah4 iyo taallooyin5 iyo xeerooyin (ballaadhan) baraago oo kale ah, iyo digsiyo (wax lagu kariyo) oo waaweyn aan laga qaadin meeshooda. Mahad naqa idinku Reer Daawuudow! Waana in yar addoomahayga mahad naqa badan.
arabic: يَعۡمَلُونَ لَهُۥ مَا يَشَآءُ مِن مَّحَٰرِيبَ وَتَمَٰثِيلَ وَجِفَانٖ كَٱلۡجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٖ رَّاسِيَٰتٍۚ ٱعۡمَلُوٓاْ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكۡرٗاۚ وَقَلِيلٞ مِّنۡ عِبَادِيَ ٱلشَّكُورُ
footnotes:
4. Waxaa lagu fasiray saro dhaadheer, degaanno, ama masaajid lagu tukado.
 5. Sawirradaa taalooyinka ah aan xaaraan ahayn xagga sharcigoodii, waxaase lagu xaaraantinimeeyey sharciga Nabi Muxammad s.c.w.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yaʿmalūna lahu mā yashāu min maḥārība watamāthīla wajifānin kal-jawābi waqudūrin rāsiyātin iʿ'malū āla dāwūda shuk'ran waqalīlun min ʿibādiya al-shakūru
